source: <dataDriven tableContainersimple.xls> <webtest nameRegister ${FirstName} ${LastName}> ... go to registration page ... <setInputField forLabelFirst name value${FirstName}/> <setInputField forLabelLast name value${LastName}/> <clickButton labelRegister/> <verifyText text${FirstName} ${LastName} has been registered/> </webtest> </dataDriven>
